name: Hexology
description:
A rough alpha version made and submitted for Greenlight Jam.

GreenLight Ideation Phase: https://roldy.itch.io/greenlight-production-hexology

GreenLight Prototype Phase: https://roldy.itch.io/greenlight-prototype-hexology

GreenLight Production Phase: https://roldy.itch.io/greenlight-production-hexology

  • 2:00 minutes to find a path through the maze and get a highscore.  
  • Travel between hex cells with the same color or shape.  
  • The faster you go the longer your tail gets and the larger the multiplier pickups become.
  • Don't wait too long or your tail will catch you.  Avoid dead ends.

Mouse controls recommended.

Keybaord and gamepad controls available.

KNOWN BUGS:  

  • Bad starts. Immediate dead ends or very limited paths.
  • Music can stop playing
